LanguageData.CB.DesignatorAreaBuildRoofExpandDesc: Colonists will pitch tents in this area.
LanguageData.CB.DesignatorAreaNoTetRoofExpandDesc: Colonists will Fold up tents in this area (Roofs will return to pre-tenting state).
LanguageData.CB.DesignatorMakeBlueprintDesc: Draw the building layout on the blueprint.
LanguageData.CB.DeconstructOrUninstall: Add designation of deconstruct or uninstall
LanguageData.CB.DesignatorPlaceBlueprintDesc: Place blueprints drawn on the layout.
